inputs.name: ScheduledTaskName
inputs.label: Scheduled Task Name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The full path of the Scheduled Task to uninstall from the server(s).
If the Scheduled Task is installed in a directory, the directory (or directories) must also be included in the path.
e.g. `MyTasks\TaskToRemove`

Wildcards are supported as well.
For example, the following would all match on the `MyTasks\TaskToRemove` task:
`*\TaskToRemove`
`MyTasks\TaskTo*`
`*\*Remove`
`MyTasks\Task*Remove`

NOTE: Be very careful when using wildcards, since if multiple Scheduled Tasks are found to match they pattern, they will all be uninstalled.

inputs.name: ComputerNames
inputs.label: Computer Names
inputs.helpMarkDown:
A comma-separated list of computers to connect to and remove the Scheduled Task from.

Leave blank to have it run on the agent's local computer.

inputs.name: Username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The username to use when connecting to the computers and removing the Scheduled Task.

Leave blank to use the identity that the agent is running as.

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The password to use when connecting to the computers and removing the Scheduled Task. As a best practice, a secret variable should be passed in here so that other users cannot see the password in plain text.

Leave blank to use the identity that the agent is running as.
